name: Comakery
description: To achieve your big mission you need to bring people together around a common vision, let them know what they will get by contributing, and organize the work. The CoMakery platform helps you do this with missions, projects, task workflows, tokens & payments.

INFURA_PROJECT_ID.description: Infura.io project id. This is needed to interact with the Ethereum blockchain. If you don't have this yet you can put in a dummy value and add it after deployment but you may seem some failures related to Ethereum transactions until you add it.

APP_HOST.description: Domain name of the app. If you don't know it at the time of deployment you can put in a dummy value. But you will want to change it once you have a domain name for your Heroku app.

BLOCK_EXPLORER_URL_CONSTELLATION_MAINNET.description: Block explorer url for constellation mainnet. This overrides the default explorer.

BLOCK_EXPLORER_URL_CONSTELLATION_TESTNET.description: Block explorer url for constellation testnet. This overrides the default explorer.

METAMASK_LOGIN.description: Enable login and signup with MetaMask

ORE_ID_SERVICE_KEY.description: Aikon ORE ID API service key

BASIC_AUTH.description: Protect app with basic auth credentials (login:password)

WHITELABEL.description: Create and apply whitelabel with APP_HOST as a default mission
